name: Tribu de Danah
description:
STORY

You are Pinoramax the last druid from Danah's village ! A villainous invader is trying to conquest your country and slave your familly as barbarian cookers cookies.
Craft some potions to overpower your warrior and destroy the Empire !

CONTROLS/REQUIREMENTS
  • Use Gamepad Controller
  • Press A to Start the game
SETUP

Unzip TribuDeDanah_VERSION.zip
Move in TribuDeDanah_VERSION/VERSION/directory
Run Danah.exe
